channel.title: Ban Appeals
channel.description:
Well most of us have been banned on runescape at least once on an account. Well i thought we could compile a list of all our [b]Successful[/b] ban appeals we have sent in to jagex and possibly use them in the future to appeal.
Here is a [b]successful[/b] one of Mine. ________________________________
Cher Jagex, je suis très désolé pour les actions commited sur mon compte. J'ai violé la règle sept et est-ce que je suis vraiment désolé, j'ai su que « Macroing » était le mal pourtant moi le faire ? Pourquoi ? Obtenir des riches ou peut-être parce que j'étais avide et égoïste, toutefois je m'ai depuis lors changé ont relu tous que vous êtes 15 règles soigneusement et la promesse je les suivrai, je violera jamais encore une règle simple encore.
Sincèrement < insert name here>

item.title: Ban Appeals
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

[quote=“K0rupt.net, post:1, topic:33256”]Well most of us have been banned on runescape at least once on an account.
Well i thought we could compile a list of all our Successful ban appeals we have sent in to jagex and possibly use them in the future to appeal.

Here is a successful one of Mine.

Cher Jagex,
je suis très désolé pour les actions commited sur mon compte. J’ai violé la règle sept et est-ce que je suis vraiment désolé, j’ai su que « Macroing » était le mal pourtant moi le faire ? Pourquoi ? Obtenir des riches ou peut-être parce que j’étais avide et égoïste, toutefois je m’ai depuis lors changé ont relu tous que vous êtes 15 règles soigneusement et la promesse je les suivrai, je violera jamais encore une règle simple encore.

Sincèrement < insert name here>[/quote]
Wow, you’ll get unbanned for that…They cant even read it! Or maybe they have translator…Well, thats a thought…Put it in a language that you think they cant understand and send that to them. Maybe because it in a different language, they’ll just let it slip? Just a thought.[br][size=1]Posted at: 09 December 2006, 07:10:22[/size][hr][quote=“not2good, post:4, topic:33256”]dude, omfg. do you have to ruin every topic?[/quote]

lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Ban Appeals
item.dc:creator: @wonderguy6 Doc. Booty
item.description:
@wonderguy6 wrote:

mine is:

Dear Jagex,

Im sorry i said to Treament1 that he was a fat poof… i didnt means it also i am sorry for these things…:
Bypassing Your Sever
Hacking your sever
Banning everyone from the sever
Calling people Fat N33bs
Bypassing the word filters
Scamming 19Mill worth of items…
Using Macros
Using Aeran
Killing Your boss, (whatever his name was)
Hacking Zezima

I hope that you let me back on my freinds(i mean my) account

and there reply:

STUF N33B you make Runescape shit you fagg

and my RE:Reply

Im sueing you

and there reply
(still havent got it today)

Read full topic

item.description:
@not2good wrote:

lol, figures. They never read em anyways. Probably have a bot or filter or something that says if the post is yey long they will unban it.
